metadata.title: CVE-2021-21434 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Survey administrator can craft a survey in such way that malicious code canbe executed in the agent interface (i.e. another agent who wants to makechanges in the survey). This issue affects: OTRS AG Survey 6.0.x version6.0.20 and prior versions; 7.0.x version 7.0.19 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
